DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and effectiveness of an investigational drug in patients with obesity (considerably overweight).
DOC.brief_title: An Investigational Drug Study in Obese (Considerably Overweight) Patients (0364-006)
DOC.criteria: Patients who are obese (considerably overweight) based on body mass index. Patients with serious or unstable current or past medical conditions
